author: Special Correspondent
text:
The State government has increased the number of services at e-seva centres.

Certificates

According to a press release, services pertaining to birth and death certificates, public grievance redressal petitions, public distribution system, driving licence, registration of property sale deeds, registration of marriage, first information report from the police and tracking the status of investigation on lost vehicles.

Residents have been asked to avail themselves of the new services, the release said.
title: More services at e-seva centres
